attachments.title: Why Your Team Sucks 2015: Denver Broncos
attachments.text: Some people are fans of the Denver Broncos. But many, many more people are NOT fans of the Denver Broncos. This 2015 Deadspin NFL team preview is for those in the latter group. Read all the previews so far here.
attachments.fallback: Deadspin: Why Your Team Sucks 2015: Denver Broncos

text: "Being able to feel stuff seems like an important part of the quarterbacking job."

wow
>Thanks to lax weed laws and the need for literally EVERY male resident of Colorado to open his own terrible microbrewery (“HURRRR I CAN MAKE BEER FOR A LIVING AND GIVE IT FUN NAMES HURRR”), Denver is now a horrifically expensive boutique neighborhood for hippie assholes, and it is surrounded by suburbs packed to the brim with loony Promise Keepers who live in Colorado because its elevation above sea level brings them that much closer to Jesus.
(i’m picking the Ravens over the Broncos week 1)
you can apply that entire paragraph to portland
some of our suburbs aren't quite as bad?
Denver suburbs are hell on earth
